text: taruvata ame ada sisuvu (maryam) nu prasavincinappudu, ame ila vinnavincukunnadi: "O na prabhu! Nenu ada sisuvunu prasavincanu" - ame prasavincinademito allah ku baga telusu mariyu baludu balika vanti vadu kadu - "mariyu nenu imeku maryam ani peru pettanu. Mariyu nenu imenu mariyu ime santananni sapincabadina (bahiskarincabadina) saitan nundi raksincataniki, ni saranu vedukuntunnanu
